Name: Southwest Community Center - Happy Food Project

Through our Happy Food Program we distribute food boxes and meals to families in need in our local community per day. Through the help of our partners Safeway and Southern Arizona Community Food Bank we have been able to distribute food to our community faithfully. We are also a food box distribution site, for the Community Food Bank of Southern Arizona.
